for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    ans = 'NO'
    if s.count('1') == s.count('0') or s.count('0') % 2 == 0 or s.count('1') % 2 == 0:
        ans = 'YES'
    print(ans)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    l = input()
    o = 0
    z = 0
    o = l.count('1')
    z = l.count('0')
    if n % 2 == 0 and o % 2 == 1 and (o != z):
        print('NO')
    else:
        print('YES')

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    t -= 1
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    count0 = s.count('0')
    count1 = n - count0
    if n % 2 == 1 or count1 == count0 or (count1 % 2 == 0 and count0 % 2 == 0):
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')
